verses.name: Joshua 24:8
verses.text: And I brought you into the land of the Amorites, which dwelt on the other side Jordan; and they fought with you: and I gave them into your hand, that ye might possess their land; and I destroyed them from before you.

verses.name: Joshua 24:9
verses.text: Then Balak the son of Zippor, king of Moab, arose and warred against Israel, and sent and called Balaam the son of Beor to curse you:

verses.name: Joshua 24:10
verses.text: But I would not hearken unto Balaam; therefore he blessed you still: so I delivered you out of his hand.
